name: Tethered (itch) (BenKerr)
description:
This game was made for the GMTK game jam 2021.

Theme: Joined Together

Created By: Benjamin Kerr (https://twitter.com/BenPKerr )
Music Done By: Scott Parker (https://twitter.com/OneRadDad )

Join together a sting of objects to complete different puzzles! Was very fun to be apart of the jam and had a blast trying out new art styles and ideas. All of the programming and art was done inside of the 48 hours given (Except for the font used)
